objects.text:
• Elegant Faux Leather Design
• Gold Hardware Accents
• Spacious Interior

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a high-end fashion product with a clean and elegant layout split into two vertical halves. The left pane features descriptive text with a modern serif and sans-serif font combination emphasizing sophistication. The text elements include a large bold headline (`heading`), a brand name subheading (`subheading`), a product feature list (`description`), a prominent price tag (`price`), and a bold call-to-action button (`cta`, supported by a colored rectangle as `cta_button_background`). The right half of the banner highlights a detailed product image (`product_image`) of a tote bag. The overall layout uses soft, overlapping vector shapes (`background`) for style and depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream: `#F6EFE5`
- Light Beige: `#F0E4D6`
- Light Mocha: `#E8D5BC`
- Camel Brown: `#C8A77D`
- Rich Brown: `#8B5A2B`
- Deep Taupe: `#5D4B35`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image features a sophisticated women's handbag in a warm taupe-brown shade. The primary color, a muted caramel brown (#A97C64), dominates the body and handles, providing a neutral yet elegant backdrop. Gold metallic hardware (#D4AF37), including buckles, charms, and logo accents, introduces luxurious contrast and highlights the bag’s premium appeal. The fine textured surface subtly blends shadows and light, enhancing dimension while maintaining visual coherence. The marble-like harmony of brown and gold makes the ensemble appear both cohesive and upscale. A supporting palette for an advertisement banner can include soft beige (#F5E4D4), off-white (#FAF8F4), and charcoal gray (#3E3E3E) for depth and spacing.
